## Government Tender Announcement
### Title
* English Title: EC015-240308 Marine Fuel Dispensing System - Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Search and Rescue Station, Shippagan, New Brunswick
* French Title: EC015-240308 Système de distribution de carburant marin - Station de recherche et de sauvetage du MPO, Shippagan, Nouveau-Brunswick

### Tender Reference Information
* Reference Number: WS4149980085-Doc4150035003
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS4149980085
* Publication Date: August 17, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: September 6, 2023 2:00:00 PM
* Amendment Date: August 23, 2023

### Tender Details
* Procurement Category: Construction
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: New Brunswick

### Contracting Entity Information
* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### End User Information
* End User Entities Name: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* End User Entities Address: 200 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Adam Beaumaster, Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC/PSPC) (He/His)
* Contact Email: adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement to install a new diesel fuel-dispensing system at the DFO Search and Rescue (SAR) station in Shippagan, New Brunswick. The estimated value of the opportunity is $100,001 to $500,000. The delivery date is 20 weeks after award of contract, and bid security is required. A list of pre-qualified firms invited to bid includes Greendale Resources Inc., Sutherland Excavating Ltd., and Terra Services Inc.
